cv: "Lillian Parker 529 Fisherking Drive, 66663 (123)345-7890, Email OBJECTIVE: To obtain a position as a Bank Teller at the Bank of America utilizing skills and training in cash handling and ability to provide direct customer services in effective manner. EDUCATION Richmond City College Las Vegas, NV | 2013 AS in Accounting and Finance KEY STRENGTHS \xe2\x80\xa2 Able to count cash speedily and accurately \xe2\x80\xa2 Good understanding of specialized banking tasks such as preparing cashiers checks and exchanging foreign currency \xe2\x80\xa2 Functional knowledge of receiving and verifying loan payments and utility bill payments \xe2\x80\xa2 Solid know-how of recording transactions promptly and in compliance with the banks policies and procedures \xe2\x80\xa2 Excellent comprehension of balancing currency, cash and checks SPECIAL SKILLS \xe2\x80\xa2 Customer services \xe2\x80\xa2 Communication \xe2\x80\xa2 Accuracy and attention to detail \xe2\x80\xa2 Stress toleration \xe2\x80\xa2 Judgment and problem solving TECHNICAL EXPERTISE \xe2\x80\xa2 MS Word, PowerPoint and Excel \xe2\x80\xa2 MS Outlook \xe2\x80\xa2 Email and Internet \xe2\x80\xa2 Basic math skills WORK EXPERIENCE Intern | HSBC Las Vegas, NV | Summer 2013 \xe2\x80\xa2 Assisted in counting the cash in drawer at the start of shift \xe2\x80\xa2 Accepted checks, cash, and other forms of payment from customers \xe2\x80\xa2 Answered questions from customers regarding their accounts \xe2\x80\xa2 Assisted in preparation of specialized types of funds, such as pay orders and travelers checks CAMPUS INVOLVEMENT \xe2\x80\xa2 Member of the school business club \xe2\x80\xa2 Member of the school baseball team \xe2\x80\xa2 President of the school drama club VOLUNTEER WORK \xe2\x80\xa2 Performed Big Sister duties for the Childrens Hospital during the summer of 2010"
